revised_title: Observations of the Second Comet of 1822 in Rio de Janeiro
tldr: The author, William Robertson, and Lieutenant Charles Drinkwater observed the second comet of 1822 in Rio de Janeiro. They recorded its position and movement, providing valuable data for the determination of the comet's orbit. The observations were made using limited instruments available at the time, demonstrating the potential for naval officers to make accurate astronomical observations.
